page.title: 02LONGFORD HALL
page.content: Longford Hall was built around the fourteenth century. Longford Hall is very interesting. The Longford family were the first people to live in the Hall. The last of the family died in 1620. After that the Hall was owned by the descendants of Sir Edward Coke. The Coke family no longer own the Hall. Longford Hall was burned down in 1942. Then it was built again in 1949. It took seven years to rebuild. It was built just as it was in 1560. There are nine chimneys on the Hall roof. There are two big gates at the Hall. Robert Bakewell made them. It is now the private home of a business man.
